title: Raducanu receives wildcard entry to Qatar Open
description: Emma Raducanu receives a wildcard entry into the Qatar Open, which is the first WTA 1,000 event of the year.
excerpt: Emma Raducanu receives a wildcard entry into the Qatar Open, which is the first WTA 1,000 event of the year.
text: Emma Raducanu has received a wildcard entry into the Qatar Open, which is the first WTA 1,000 event of the year.The British number two and world number 56 reached the third round of the Australian Open before being beaten by Iga Swiatek.Since then, Nick Cavaday has stepped back from his role as Raducanu's coach for health reasons, while the 22-year-old has lost back-to-back matches. She was beaten by Cristina Bucsa of Spain in the opening round of the Singapore Open before losing to former Wimbledon champion Marketa Vondrousova at the Abu Dhabi Open.The Qatar Open will take place in Doha between 9 and 15 February.
html:
Emma Raducanu has received a wildcard entry into the Qatar Open, which is the first WTA 1,000 event of the year.

The British number two and world number 56 reached the third round of the Australian Open before being beaten by Iga Swiatek.

Since then, Nick Cavaday has stepped back from his role as Raducanu's coach for health reasons, while the 22-year-old has lost back-to-back matches.

She was beaten by Cristina Bucsa of Spain in the opening round of the Singapore Open before losing to former Wimbledon champion Marketa Vondrousova at the Abu Dhabi Open.

The Qatar Open will take place in Doha between 9 and 15 February.
